Name: moogul818
Title: Well Maintained Stadium
Review: The GMC Balayogi Atheletic stadium is inside the Sports Authority of Telangana sports complex at Gachibowli Hyderabad. It has a synthetic running track and a grass football pitch in the centre. The stadium is well maintained and hosts sports events through out the year.The athletics stadium has its own parking and a practice/warm up ground outside. It is worth a visit along with other sports arenas ( indoor badminton, hockey)  inside the sports complex.

Name: Ravindra V
Title: Great experience
Review: We went there for watching Pro Kabaddi match. The experience was simply amazing. The players were clearly visible and it felt different experience than watching on the TV. They sell food like popcorn, sweetcorn, sandwiches, burgers etc but only popcorn and sweetcorn is allowed inside. The lights and decoration was good inside the indoor stadium. Has ample parking inside the stadium complex.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: nice athletic track
Review: This place serves as end place for Airtel marathon when we start from peoples plaza.this has all the facilities needed for sports and its amazing

Name: idea614354
Title: big stadium
Review: Balayogi stadium very famous and big in hyderabad. Conducting amny games here local and national yearly.

Name: Amazing_Neo
Title: Huge and well planned ground
Review: This is a huge place and well accommodates events and sports activities. There is ample parking and other facilities too.

Name: Karthik Dasu
Title: Good stadium
Review: We have visited this stadium, during the kabbadi premier leahue.The stadium is very close to city, unlike upplal.

Name: Veer2468
Title: Very nice
Review: This is a stadium at an excellent location- Gachibowli. Located near IT offices. Its well maintained

Name: koteswararao
Title: improved    stadium
Review: improved  with all facilities  good stadium  was constructed which is popular in India and state for games

Name: Nikhil P
Title: Nicely maintained stadium
Review: Also known as Gachibowli stadium, it’s a world class stadium which hosts lots of athletic and trek and field events in Hyderabad and its also the finishing point for Airtel Hyderabad Marathon. Its huge and spacious and nicely maintained.

Name: BRKanth
Title: Good place for Yoga
Review: Best place for morning walk and for any public occassions. Neatly planned and built with in the city.

Name: ravirjy
Title: Nice Stadium
Review: It is very good stadium for yoga and good trainings purposes. It has very minimum fees and open for public. so try to go this stadium and enjoy the facilities.

Name: Sukhbir K
Title: Great facilities for that athlete inside you!
Review: This stadium is very close to my place and i go here regularly for my morning runs, strength training sessions and yoga sessions. Running track and Swimming pool in this stadium are of international levels. The best part is that this stadium is open to public by payment of nominal fees. People living around the stadium must make a use of this facility.I am thankful to the Stadium administration for allowing amateur runners, sportspersons like me to allow the use of the stadium facilities.

Name: shivaraikod
Title: World class stadium
Review: This stadium is another feather in hyderabad's cap which is already known for its it and pharma companies. A country  where cricket is considered as a religion this athletic stadium stands out of the crowd

Name: SuvodipMoitra
Title: Latest EDM Venue
Review: This is the hottest destination for EDM fans. Apart from regular sports events, top class EDM concerts like Sunburn & Sensation is hosted here. Last week, went to this stadium for Tomorrowland Unite.

Name: Prashanth G
Title: Stadium
Review: This stadium is technically well built. Both indoor and outdoor sports can be played here at different places

Name: Praveen K
Title: World Class Stadium in Hyderabad
Review: this stadium is a world class Stadium in hyderabad. Been here for Airtel MArathon. the marathon ended here. Ample space for parking and Easy access to highway.
